items.title: Wellcome to Stotina
items.description: Stotina is a startup aiming to provide solutions that...
items.author: Aleksandar Dinkov
items.content:
Stotina is a startup aiming to provide solutions that simplify common tasks and help people use technology without requiring any technical expertese.
Simplicity is key.
